org.drools.planner.core.localsearch
Interface LocalSearchSolver

All Superinterfaces:
Solver
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultLocalSearchSolver
public interface LocalSearchSolver
extends Solver

A LocalSearchSolver is a Solver which uses a local search algorithm, such as tabu search, simulated annealing, ...

See Also:
Solver, DefaultLocalSearchSolver
